verses.verse: My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H5354>weary<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>; I will give free <S%H5800>course<s%> to my <S%H7879>complaint<s%>; I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
I will <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H433>God<s%>, Do not <S%H7561>condemn<s%> <S%H3045>me<s%>; Show me wherefore thou contendest with <S%H7378>me<s%>.

Is it <S%H2895>good<s%> unto thee that thou shouldest <S%H6231>oppress<s%>, That thou shouldest <S%H3988>despise<s%> the <S%H3018>work<s%> of thy <S%H3709>hands<s%>, And <S%H3313>shine<s%> upon the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>?
Hast thou <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>? Or <S%H7200>seest<s%> thou as <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%>?
Are thy <S%H3117>days<s%> as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H582>man<s%>, Or thy <S%H8141>years<s%> as <S%H1397>man<s%>'s <S%H3117>days<s%>,
That thou <S%H1245>inquirest<s%> after mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, And <S%H1875>searchest<s%> after my <S%H2403>sin<s%>,
Although thou <S%H1847>knowest<s%> that I am not <S%H7561>wicked<s%>, And there is none that can <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>?
Thy <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H6087>framed<s%> me and <S%H6213>fashioned<s%> me <S%H3162>Together<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>; yet thou dost destroy <S%H1104>me<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%>, I beseech <S%H6213>thee<s%>, that thou hast fashioned me as <S%H2563>clay<s%>; And wilt thou <S%H7725>bring<s%> me into <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>?
Hast thou not poured me <S%H5413>out<s%> as <S%H2461>milk<s%>, And <S%H7087>curdled<s%> me like <S%H1385>cheese<s%>?
Thou hast <S%H3847>clothed<s%> me with <S%H5785>skin<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, And <S%H7753>knit<s%> me together with <S%H6106>bones<s%> and <S%H1517>sinews<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H6213>granted<s%> me <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>; And thy <S%H6486>visitation<s%> hath <S%H8104>preserved<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
Yet these things thou didst <S%H6845>hide<s%> in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>; I know that this is with <S%H3045>thee<s%>:
If I <S%H2398>sin<s%>, then thou <S%H8104>markest<s%> <S%H5352>me<s%>, And thou wilt not acquit me from mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

If I be <S%H7561>wicked<s%>, <S%H480>woe<s%> unto <S%H6663>me<s%>; And if I be righteous, yet shall I not lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%>; Being <S%H7649>filled<s%> with <S%H7036>ignominy<s%>, And <S%H7202>looking<s%> upon mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.
And if my head <S%H1342>exalt<s%> <S%H6679>itself<s%>, thou huntest me as a <S%H7826>lion<s%>; And <S%H7725>again<s%> thou showest thyself marvellous upon <S%H6381>me<s%>.

Thou <S%H2318>renewest<s%> thy <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> against <S%H7235>me<s%>, And increasest thine <S%H3708>indignation<s%> upon <S%H5978>me<s%>: <S%H2487>Changes<s%> and warfare are with <S%H6635>me<s%>.
Wherefore then hast thou brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H7358>womb<s%>? I had given up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%>, and no <S%H5869>eye<s%> had seen <S%H7200>me<s%>.
I should have been as though I had not <S%H2986>been<s%>; I should have been carried from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave<s%>.
Are not my <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%>? <S%H2308>cease<s%> <S%H7896>then<s%>, And let me alone, that I may take <S%H1082>comfort<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%>,
Before I <S%H3212>go<s%> whence I shall not <S%H7725>return<s%>, Even to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and of the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>;

The <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5890>dark<s%> as <S%H652>midnight<s%>, The land of the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>, without any <S%H5468>order<s%>, And where the <S%H3313>light<s%> is as <S%H652>midnight<s%>.
